name: It's been a while
description:
A game aimed mainly at visuals, that was created solo this year.

Within the darkness of the last year it's rather easy to withdraw and lose touch with yourself. That was also the thought in mind when I was working on this game, though It'd be cool.

Vocals kindly provided by Sarah van Loenen

Edit: I made a quick version with some of the heavyweight stuff reduced. hopefully that'll work better for people without steroid pc's.

https://itch.io/jam/global-game-jam-nl-2021/rate/902829

https://github.com/Landerack/GlobalGameJam2021

(music from a humble dev bundle)
